original_title: Ida Haendel & Ilya Itin - Bach, Beethoven, Chausson
overview: The legendary violinist Ida Haendel performs works by Beethoven, Bach, and Chausson, joined by pianist Ilya Itin. Program features Beethoven's Violin Sonatas Nos. 8 in G Major and 9 in A Major ("Kreutzer"), Bach's monumental Chaconne for solo violin, and Chausson's Po√®me, Op. 25.
title: Ida Haendel & Ilya Itin - Bach, Beethoven, Chausson
